ModMetaData.name: Rolling Table
ModMetaData.author: Dr Zhivago
ModMetaData.description:
A table used to roll joints more effectively than a crafting spot on the ground. Can make smokeleaf joints in x1, x5, or x10 quantity. Compatible with VGP Medicine, to roll cigarillos.
Credits: Xen- for helping me realize I was missing defs ilawz- for texture modifications Lanilor- for helping me learn xpath patching on the Discord
